attributes.additional_details:
Since the UK is Canada's most important partner in Europe while also being very popular with Canadian Tourists. While the UK and Canada both share a rich heritage and ancestry since migration from UK to Canada was extremely high with special treatment given to UK individuals until 1967 when Canadian law reversed the policy.

This petition is for the UK Government to build upon, secure and cement a special relationship with Canada in order for the relationship to be robust for the future.
